description: A small Python command-line application for managing a todo list. It allows users to add, list, complete, and delete tasks, storing them in a local JSON file. The application is structured into modules for the CLI interface, task management service, and a persistence layer, with comprehensive tests for core functionalities.

modules.description: This module handles the command-line interface, parsing user commands and displaying results. It interacts with the task service to perform operations like adding, listing, completing, and deleting tasks.

classes.description: Handles user input from the command line, parses commands, and invokes the appropriate methods in the task service. It provides feedback to the user based on the results of these operations.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Starts the CLI loop, continuously reading user input and processing commands until the user exits.

methods.name: parse_command
methods.description: Parses a command string from the user and determines the action to take.

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: The command string input by the user.

modules.description: This module provides the core functionality for managing tasks. It includes operations to add, list, complete, and delete tasks, interfacing with the persistence layer to store and retrieve task data.

classes.description: Manages the lifecycle of tasks, including adding, listing, completing, and deleting tasks. It interacts with the persistence layer to ensure tasks are stored and retrieved correctly.

fields.name: tasks
fields.description: A list of current tasks managed by the service.

methods.name: add_task
methods.description: Adds a new task to the list and persists it.

parameters.name: task_description
parameters.description: The description of the task to be added.

methods.name: list_tasks
methods.description: Returns a list of all current tasks.

methods.name: complete_task
methods.description: Marks a task as completed and updates the persistence layer.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to be marked as completed.

methods.name: delete_task
methods.description: Deletes a task from the list and updates the persistence layer.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to be deleted.

modules.description: This module handles the storage and retrieval of tasks from a local JSON file. It provides methods to read and write task data, ensuring data integrity and consistency.

classes.description: Manages the reading and writing of task data to a JSON file. It ensures that tasks are correctly serialized and deserialized, maintaining data integrity.

fields.name: file_path
fields.description: The path to the JSON file where tasks are stored.

methods.name: load_tasks
methods.description: Loads tasks from the JSON file and returns them as a list.

methods.name: save_tasks
methods.description: Saves the current list of tasks to the JSON file.

parameters.name: tasks
parameters.description: The list of tasks to be saved.

tests.description: Tests the command parsing and execution logic of the CommandLineInterface class, ensuring that user commands are correctly interpreted and executed.
Tests the task management operations of the TaskService class, including adding, listing, completing, and deleting tasks.
Tests the persistence operations of the JsonStorage class, ensuring tasks are correctly saved to and loaded from the JSON file.
